title: Golden Globes Photos: See All the Looks From the Red Carpet
description: Stars made their glittering arrival for the 82nd Golden Globes, an awards season opener of sorts that celebrates the biggest stars in film and television.
excerpt: Stars made their glittering arrival for the 82nd Golden Globes, an awards season opener of sorts that celebrates the biggest stars in film and television.
text: AdvertisementSKIP ADVERTISEMENTGolden Globes Photos: See All the Looks From the Red CarpetStars made their glittering arrival for the 82nd Golden Globes, an awards season opener of sorts that celebrates the biggest stars in film and television.Zoe Saldaña, winner of the 2025 Golden Globe for best supporting actress in a motion picture, on Sunday. When it comes to awards show dressing, there was little learning curve to speak of on the early-in-the-season Globes red carpet.Credit...Daniel Cole/ReutersPublished Jan. 5, 2025Updated Jan. 6, 2025, 12:30 a.m. ETBy some measures, awards season dressing has already been underway for weeks: Festival juries and critics associations hand out trophies, and if stars deign to collect them in person, propriety generally demands that they be clothed.With social media, celebrities have a platform to show off their looks even when network TV cameras are nowhere to be found. But as of Sunday, when the Golden Globes were held at the Beverly Hilton Hotel in Los Angeles, the televised portion of the horse race for hardware has begun in earnest — and stars dressed accordingly. Below, see what Hollywood’s buzziest stars from the worlds of movies and TV wore to make their closely watched red carpet entrances.ImageDemi Moore, winner of the Golden Globe for best actress in a musical or comedy for “The Substance,” in custom Giorgio Armani Privé.Credit...Jordan Strauss/Invision, via Associated PressSwipe for more →Zendaya, nominated for best actress in a musical or comedy Golden Globes Photos: See All the Looks From the Red Carpet

Stars made their glittering arrival for the 82nd Golden Globes, an awards season opener of sorts that celebrates the biggest stars in film and television.

Published Jan. 5, 2025Updated Jan. 6, 2025, 12:30 a.m. ET

By some measures, awards season dressing has already been underway for weeks: Festival juries and critics associations hand out trophies, and if stars deign to collect them in person, propriety generally demands that they be clothed.

With social media, celebrities have a platform to show off their looks even when network TV cameras are nowhere to be found. But as of Sunday, when the Golden Globes were held at the Beverly Hilton Hotel in Los Angeles, the televised portion of the horse race for hardware has begun in earnest — and stars dressed accordingly. Below, see what Hollywood’s buzziest stars from the worlds of movies and TV wore to make their closely watched red carpet entrances.

  1. Jordan Strauss/Invision, via Associated Press
  2. Daniel Cole/Reuters
  3. Daniel Cole/Reuters
  4. Amy Sussman/Getty Images

  2. Etienne Laurent/Agence France-Presse — Getty Images
  3. Etienne Laurent/Agence France-Presse — Getty Images
  1. Jordan Strauss/Invision, via Associated Press
  2. Daniel Cole/Reuters
  3. Etienne Laurent/Agence France-Presse — Getty Images
  4. Jordan Strauss/Invision, via Associated Press

A correction was made on

Jan. 5, 2025

: 

An earlier version of a picture caption with this article, using information from a wire service, misidentified a Golden Globe attendee. She is Lauren LeFranc, not Karla Sofía Gascón.
